page.title: 12BEDDINGTON PARK (2)
page.content: build footpaths along its entire length. There are several sports facilit- ies in the Park - games such as tennis, cricket, football and hockey are cater- ed for. There are several changing room with showers in the centre of the Park. Beddington Cricket Club have their pavilion and pitch in the Park. At one end of the Park there are swings, climbing frames, a large slide and a putting green with a cafe nearby. There is also a supervised Play Centre which is used after school and in the holidays. Because of its location, size and amenities, Beddington Park is very pop- ular with children and families in the neighbourhood. It is a particularly beautiful place with lovely gardens and streams running through it.
